alert.note: Alert for Chester; Laurens; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Laurens, western Chester and southeastern Union Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Union, or near Rose Hill State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Union, Carlisle, Chester State Park, Rose Hill State Park, Monarch Mill, Lowrys, Leeds, Cornwell and Santuc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for Upstate South Carolina.
